summary: 1978  was a common year starting on Sunday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: 1978  was a common year starting on Sunday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1978th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 978th year of the 2nd millennium, the 78th year of the 20th century, and the 9th year of the 1970s decade.
